entities: International Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia
summary: The Security Council, recalling resolution 1786 (2007) and Article 16 of the Statute of the International Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia, decides to reappoint Mr. Serge Brammertz as Prosecutor for a term from 1 January 2012 to 31 December 2014, notwithstanding the provisions on length of office, subject to earlier termination upon completion of the Tribunal's work, in order to expedite the completion of its remaining work by 31 December 2014 as called for in resolution 1966 (2010).
